ygData.subject: A time, 20 million years ago
ygData.msgSnippet: Megatron stood, looking blankly at the shackled Perceptor, his mind racing. ... Megatron stood there again, in that academy, the other trainees backing off,

Subject: A time, 20 million years ago

Megatron stood, looking blankly at the shackled Perceptor, his mind
racing.
::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::
Megatron stood there again, in that academy, the other trainees backing
off, their teacher, a smoking wreck at his feet. He held up his cannon,
and let its awesome energy roar upwards, ripping through the cieling of
the building, the area collapsing around him. 

"I am Megatron. New leader of the Decepticons." He said proudly. The
students looked around at themselves in disbelief.

"But the Decepticons are beaten." A student said, walking forward.
Megatron pointed his cannon at the robot, and let a blast of energy rip
into him, tearing the robot in two. His painfilled screams filled the
academy, as the other trainees covered their heads in fear. 

"Bah, Weaklings!" Bludgeon announced. 

"I am entitled to agree with you. They serve no role in the future of
the Decepticons." He transformed, into a futuristic hover tank. 

::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::
He remembered back. It was his Cybertron mode, before he was outfited
for earth. He smiled, in front of Ragnus and Perceptor.
::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::
Bludgeon and Megatron drove away from the academy in their seperate tank
modes. Fire was burning the academy in the backround, the flaming heat
licking at them as they left. Then a word, and name he could be forced
to remember yelled out to him. "HALT. In the name of Prime, you are to
be destroyed." Megatron rememberd turning around. Standing there in
front of him, the Autobots cut-out hero. Gauntlet Prime. There, standing
in front of a trailor filled with deactivated Decepticon bodies, was the
Autobot leader, and carrier of the Matrix. He held up his laser claw,
his weapon of choice, and fired it twice, the bolts of energy smashing
into the front of Bludgeon, sending the creator of Mettallo, sinking
into the destroyed road. "Now its just you and me, Slagmaker." he said
the words with contempt, and Megatron felt the exact same way back.
